tier.item: (13) Tupinambá examples (Rodrigues 2001; glosses mine; v = IPA [B])
a. sjé re-kúj-a b. sjé re-kúj
`my gourd', `It's my gourd.' `I have a gourd / gourds.'

tier.item: `I want your sleep.' `I saw it in my sleep.'
= `I want you to sleep.' (= `in my dreams')
e. né kér-a a-j-potár f.a-s-epják sjé kér-Èpe
